roadmap.title: Hub-and-Spoke Landing Zone via IaC
tasks: Author hub + spoke VNets, subnets, NSGs, and peering in Terraform/Bicep
Add basic tags (env, owner, app) on all resources from day one
Run plan/apply cycles and validate basic connectivity
deliverables: Working hub + spoke VNets with peering

roadmap.title: Security Baseline (Key Vault, RBAC, Policy)
tasks: Deploy Key Vault and wire managed identities/service principals
Configure least-privilege RBAC for infra and app identities
Add Azure Policies (allowed locations, required tags, HTTPS only, no public IP on certain resources)

roadmap.title: Monitoring and Observability Baseline
tasks: Create Log Analytics workspace and link hub + spokes
Enable diagnostics for VNets/NSGs, Key Vault, App Service/VM
Create alerts for availability, CPU, and error rate

roadmap.title: Compute + Storage/DB in a Spoke
tasks: Deploy App Service or VM via IaC into a spoke
Deploy Storage account + table/blob or small DB
Deploy a 'hello API/app' that uses storage/DB
deliverables: Running demo app in a spoke
App configuration and connection strings documented

roadmap.title: Platform Golden Path Template (Future-Leaning)
tasks: Create a template folder for a new spoke app (VNet bits, Key Vault, monitoring, app config)
Wire pipelines so using the template auto-builds infra + app
Document the Git-first onboarding workflow (copy template, change values, push)
deliverables: Golden path template for new spoke apps
Example PR/story for new app onboarding

roadmap.title: CI/CD for IaC and App (GitOps Style)
tasks: Create IaC pipeline (lint/validate, plan, apply to dev)
Create app pipeline (build, test, deploy to spoke)
Add branching/approval rules and document PR â†’ dev flow

roadmap.title: FinOps and Governance Basics (Future-Leaning)
tasks: Enforce cost/owner tags via Policy
Configure budgets/alerts per subscription or per app resource group
Document the cost management pattern in /docs

roadmap.title: Azure AI Foundry Copilot over /docs
tasks: Create Azure AI Foundry project/agent
Connect /docs as grounding source
Tune system prompt + test questions (onboarding, hub-spoke explanation)

roadmap.title: MCP Server + get_vnet_topology

Implement get_vnet_topology using ARM/Resource Graph
Register MCP server as a tool with the Foundry agent and test end-to-end

Implement list_noncompliant_resources (simple tag or policy check)
Document usage patterns in /docs and test from copilot
